scripts.start: concurrently 'cd fd-backend && npm run start:dev' 'cd fd-frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.install: concurrently 'cd fd-backend && npm i' 'cd fd-frontend && npm i'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:back && npm run lint:front
scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:front && npm run start:front && npm run test:cypress
scripts.start:front: cd fd-frontend && npm start & wait-on http://localhost:3000
